name: Coconut Shrimp Curry
ingredients: 1/2 pound of shrimp, peeled and deveined
instructions: 1. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat.
2. Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the skillet and sauté until they become fragrant and translucent, about 2-3 minutes.
3. Sprinkle the curry powder over the onions and garlic and stir well to coat.
4. Add the shrimp to the skillet and cook until they turn pink and are fully cooked, about 3-4 minutes.
5. Pour the coconut milk into the skillet and stir in the fish sauce and brown sugar.
6. Reduce the heat to low and let the curry simmer for about 5 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
7. Stir in the frozen peas and cook for an additional 2 minutes, until the peas are heated through.
8. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
9. Remove from heat and garnish with fresh cilantro before serving.
description: Coconut Shrimp Curry is a rich and flavorful dish that combines succulent shrimp with a creamy coconut sauce infused with aromatic curry and spices. The addition of peas adds a pop of color and sweetness, making this dish a perfect balance of flavors.
